example.text: The Biden administration's border policies have strained our resources, incentivized illegal immigration, endangered Americans, & empowered cartels to exploit migrants coming here in pursuit of a better life. As long as this crisis is ignored, our communities will suffer.

Retail crime is a serious issue in #CA40 & across SoCal that hurts businesses, consumers, & our communities. I introduced a bipartisan bill to improve law enforcement information sharing to address these crimes & am working with local law enforcement & businesses on solutions.

I'm proud that Team Young has returned $17 million+ back to CA-39 taxpayers and helped 3,500+ constituents receive assistance from federal agencies like the IRS, SBA and the VA. If you need help with a federal agency, please reach out to my office. We're here to serve you always.

Thank you [[user]] for allowing me to join your [[user]] Economic Opportunity Subcommittee hearing in Oceanside on addressing veteran homelessness. I asked about best practices San Diego County officials have learned & how we can better coordinate among VA regions. [[url]]

As we face growing aggression from adversaries like China, Russia and Iran, the need for a capable, modernized military is more important than ever. I will always stand with the brave men and women who keep America safe.

The NDAA helps us support our troops and protect our national security at home and abroad. I'm glad my efforts to track the delivery of US defense equipment sold to our allies and prioritize the reunion of Korean Americans with their family members in North Kora were included.
